Module RMA
Package RMA

Class RMAListViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMA.RMAListViewModel
  • public class RMAListViewModel
extends java.lang.Object
    RMAListViewModel contains the fields that make up the model for the RMAListView form.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<CustomerAddress> address
      address maintains the business address associated with this RMA request.
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty businessName
      businessName contains the business name associated with the RMA request.
      private javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<java.time.LocalDateTime> created
      created contains the date and time the RMA was created.
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty customerName
      customerName contains the customer name associated with the RMA request.
      private javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<PurchaseOrderProduct> product
      product contains the product information associated with this RMA request.
      private javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty returnQuantity
      returnQuantity contains the number of items that are being returned.
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty rmaId
      rmaId contains the identifier to the RMA request.
      private javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty shipReplaceRepair
      shipReplaceRepair indicates whether this RMA's replacement or repaired part was shipped.
      private javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty shouldDelete
      shouldDelete contains whether this RMA request is currently selected for deletion in RMAListView.
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty status
      status contains the textual description of the RMA's status.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RMAListViewModel​(java.lang.String newRMAId)
      This constructor for RMAListViewModel takes in an RMA ID in order to fetch the necessary related information.
      RMAListViewModel​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String status, boolean shipReplaceRepair, java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String businessName, CustomerAddress address, PurchaseOrderProduct product, int returnQuantity, boolean shouldDelete, java.time.LocalDateTime created)
      Constructor for RMAListViewModel that manually fills in all the field details.

      customerNameProperty returns the StringProperty containing the customer's name referenced in the RMA request.

      delete removes this RMA request from the database.

      productProperty returns the ObjectProperty containing the RMA's referenced PurchaseOrderProduct.

      returnQuantityProperty returns the IntegerProperty containing the number of items that are being returned.
      javafx.beans.property.StringProperty rmaIdProperty()
      rmaIdProperty returns the StringProperty field containing the RMA ID.
      javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty shipReplaceRepairProperty()
      shipReplaceRepairProperty returns the BooleanProperty field containing whether the RMA's replacement or repair was shipped.
      javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty shouldDeleteProperty()
      shouldDeleteProperty returns the BooleanProperty containing whether the user is planning to delete the RMA request referenced by this model.
      javafx.beans.property.StringProperty statusProperty()
      statusProperty returns the StringProperty field containing the textual description of the RMA status.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RMAListViewModel

        public RMAListViewModel​(java.lang.String newRMAId)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        This constructor for RMAListViewModel takes in an RMA ID in order to fetch the necessary related information.
        Parameters:
        newRMAId - A String containing the RMA ID to reference.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the SQL Server database or the SQL query.

      • RMAListViewModel

        public RMAListViewModel​(java.lang.String rmaId,
                        java.lang.String status,
                        boolean shipReplaceRepair,
                        java.lang.String customerName,
                        java.lang.String businessName,
                        CustomerAddress address,
                        PurchaseOrderProduct product,
                        int returnQuantity,
                        boolean shouldDelete,
                        java.time.LocalDateTime created)
        Constructor for RMAListViewModel that manually fills in all the field details.
        Parameters:
        rmaId - The String RMA ID to assign to this RMAListViewModel.
        status - The String RMA status description to use for this RMAListViewModel.
        shipReplaceRepair - The boolean status of shipping a replacement or repair.
        customerName - The String customer name to use.
        businessName - The String business name to use.
        address - The CustomerAddress to associate with this RMAListViewModel.
        product - The PurchaseOrderProduct to associate with this RMAListViewModel.
        returnQuantity - The amount of product being returned by the customer.
        shouldDelete - Whether this RMA should be flagged for deletion.
        created - The LocalDateTime to assign to the RMA in this RMAListViewModel.
